text: @dougducey The protestors who were looting nationwide wasn't wearing mask. I think they accidentally proved that this covid-19 scare is a falsehood pushed by the Left to try to discredit Trump. Also, viruses can't flourish during summer months because of the sun, which produces vitamin D.
